name: Terminals
tagline: Terminals is a multi-tab terminal services and remote desktop client. Moreover Terminals is capable beside RDP of supporting AutoIt, a shell explorer, http connections, ICA/Citrix connections, telnet, ssh, VNC and many other protocols.
body:
### Welcome to Terminals.

Terminals is a multi-tab terminal services and remote desktop client. Moreover Terminals is capable beside RDP of supporting AutoIt, a shell explorer, http connections, ICA/Citrix connections, telnet, ssh, VNC and many other protocols.

Download the latest release:
* [as a ZIP file](https://github.com/OliverKohlDSc/Terminals/releases/download/4.7.5.0/Terminals_4.7.5.0.zip) or
* in form of an [installer](https://github.com/OliverKohlDSc/Terminals/releases/download/4.7.5.0/Setup_4.7.5.0.exe)

Want to have a look at the source code?
[Please follow the link](https://github.com/OliverKohlDSc/Terminals).

### Authors and Contributors
@OliverKohlDSc
[Facebook](http://www.facebook.com/kohloliver1)
[XING](https://www.xing.com/profile/Oliver_Kohl15)
[Google](https://plus.google.com/103599442530756456437)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Terminals? Check out the [bug and issue tracker](https://github.com/OliverKohlDSc/Terminals/issues/new) or please be so kind to use my personal [contact form](http://www.kohl.bz/contact/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
